articles.author: Nick Paton Walsh
articles.title: Ukraine’s defeat at Avdiivka darkens the mood in the West - CNN
articles.description: It is a pivotal moment, where both Russian advances and Western atrophy threaten to transform the biggest land war in Europe since the 1940s.
articles.content:
